basic example.link: This is some text with [a link](http://example.com)
basic example.list and links:
-   Watch the [my-robotic-friends](http://my-robotic-friends.com).
-   Read [my-robotic-friends-packet](http://my-robotic-friends-packet.com).
-   Print out one [symbol-key](http://symbol-key.com) per group. This is "code" to be used.
-   [paper-trapezoid-template](http://paper-trapezoid-template.com) are provided if your class is not going to use cups.
-   Print out one set of [stacking-cups-ideas](http://stacking-cups-ideas.com) per group.
-   Make sure each student has a [think-spot-journal](http://think-spot-journal.com).
basic example.newline: This is some text with a trailing newline
